description: A female is in hospital with significant injuries after the rush-hour crash on Thursday.
title: Boy, 17, arrested after passenger injured in crash
title_page: West Bridgford: Boy, 17, arrested after passenger injured in crash - BBC News
maintext:
A 17-year-old boy has been arrested following a crash that left a woman with significant head injuries.
Emergency services were called to reports of a collision between a motorcycle and a car in Wilford Lane, West Bridgford, Nottinghamshire, at about 17:00 GMT on Thursday.
The female pillion passenger is being treated in hospital, police said.
The teenager was arrested on suspicion of causing serious injury by dangerous driving, driving whilst unfit through drugs, and possessing cannabis.
